thread.title: College Football 2015: Week 4 scores, updates, tweets, broadcast info from the MAC and more
thread.title_full: College Football 2015: Week 4 scores, updates, tweets, broadcast info from the MAC and more | cleveland.com

author: Elton Alexander, The Plain Dealer
title: College Football 2015: Week 4 scores, updates, tweets, broadcast info from the MAC and more
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- It's Week 4 of the 2015 College Football season and the final week of tune-up play before Mid-American Conference play begins in earnest. Notable games include Western Michigan at Ohio State, Bowling Green at Purdue and Ohio University at Minnesota. All 13 teams from the MAC play, with the only local major college game being Marshall at Kent State.
Below is our schedule/scoreboard, including broadcast information, links to previews and other stories of interest, and live Twitter updates. Tweets from https://twitter.com/EmilyMBamforth/lists/mac
 MAC Games Today
 • Bowling Green at Purdue; noon, BTN • Central Michigan at No. 2 Michigan State; noon, ESPN3 • Ohio University at Minnesota; 3:30 p.m., BTN • Western Michigan at No. 1 Ohio State; 3:30 p.m., ABC • Ball State at No. 17 Northwestern; 8 p.m., BTN • Northern Illinois at Boston College; 1 p.m., ESNP3 • Marshall at Kent State; 3:30 p.m., ASN, ESPN3 • Nevada at Buffalo; 3:30 p.m., ESPN3 • UMass at No. 6 Notre Dame; 3:30 p.m., NBC Miami at Western Kentucky, 3:30p.m. CBS • Army at Eastern Michigan; 6 p.m., ESPN3 • Akron at Louisiana-Lafayette; 7 p.m., ESPN3 • Arkansas State at Toledo; 7 p.m., ESPN3
Other Top 25 Games Today
Southern vs. No. 7 Georgia, noon, SEC Network No. 8 LSU vs. Syracuse, noon, ESPN No. 20 Georgia Tech vs. Duke, noon, ESPN2 No. 22 BYU vs. Michigan, noon, ABC Rice vs. No. 5 Baylor, 3 p.m., FSN Massachusetts vs. No. 6 Notre Dame, 3:30 p.m., NBC No. 24 Oklahoma State vs. Texas, 3:30 p.m., ESPN Louisiana Monroe vs. No. 12 Alabama 4 p.m., SEC Net No. 3 TCU vs. Texas Tech, 4:30 p.m., Fox Sports Vanderbilt vs. No. 3 Ole Miss, 7 p.m., ESPNU No. 14 Texas A&M vs. Arkansas, 7 p.m., ESPN No. 25 Missouri vs. Kentucky, 7:30 p.m., SEC Network No. 9 UCLA vs. No. 16 Arizona, 8 p.m., ABC Ball State vs. No. 17 Northwestern 8 p.m., BTN Hawaii vs. No. 22 Wisconsin, 8 p.m., BTN No. 18 Utah vs. No. 13 Oregon, 8:30 p.m., FOX No. 19 USC vs. Arizona State, 10:30 p.m., ESPN Local College schedule
Lake Erie College vs. Ohio Dominican, 12:30 p.m., Live video Ashland vs. Findlay, 7 p.m., Live video Notre Dame College vs. Shepherd, 7 p.m., Live audio Case Western Reserve vs. Thiel, 1 p.m., Live stats.
